error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to Proxmox VE server
error.ssl_error: SSL check failed. Check the SSL settings

data_description.password: The new password for the Proxmox VE server

reauth_confirm.description: The connection to the Proxmox VE server requires re-authentication. Please enter your password to continue.
reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate Proxmox VE integration

reconfigure.description: Use the following form to reconfigure your Proxmox VE server connection.
reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Proxmox VE integration

user.description: Enter your Proxmox VE server details to set up the integration.
user.title: Connect to Proxmox VE

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_connect_tim.description: Configuring {integration_title} via YAML is deprecated and will be removed in a future release. While importing your configuration, a connection timeout occurred. Please correct your YAML configuration and restart Home Assistant, or remove the {domain} key from your configuration and configure the integration via the UI.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_connect_tim.title: The {integration_title} YAML configuration is being removed

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.description: Configuring {integration_title} via YAML is deprecated and will be removed in a future release. While importing your configuration, invalid authentication details were found. Please correct your YAML configuration and restart Home Assistant, or remove the {domain} key from your configuration and configure the integration via the UI.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.title: [%key:component::proxmoxve::issues::deprecated_yaml_import_issue_connect_timeout::title%]

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_no_nodes_fo.description: Configuring {integration_title} via YAML is deprecated and will be removed in a future release. While importing your configuration, no active nodes were found on the Proxmox VE server. Please correct your YAML configuration and restart Home Assistant, or remove the {domain} key from your configuration and configure the integration via the UI.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_no_nodes_fo.title: [%key:component::proxmoxve::issues::deprecated_yaml_import_issue_connect_timeout::title%]

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_ssl_error.description: Configuring {integration_title} via YAML is deprecated and will be removed in a future release. While importing your configuration, an SSL error occurred. Please correct your YAML configuration and restart Home Assistant, or remove the {domain} key from your configuration and configure the integration via the UI.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_ssl_error.title: [%key:component::proxmoxve::issues::deprecated_yaml_import_issue_connect_timeout::title%]
